entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 26.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
